name: Perfect Brakes
description:
Perfect brakes is an exercise in making a nice character controller for car.

Many top-down car games like Micro Machines or GTA use the classic tank controls. This game is a study in making a car feel like a car (and an acrobatic one of the sort) but using modern third-person controls.

Goal

The game has no inherent goal but try making donuts for as long as possible.

Controls

Arrow keys or controller.
